name: Duo Consulting, Inc.
description:
Duo is a web design and development agency that uses Drupal to build business platforms that forge deeper relationships with your customers. We’ve spent the past 20 years helping organizations like yours drive measurable results by taking a strategic approach to website design and development.
We’re not just a development firm; we’re consultants who provide ideas and recommendations for your web presence as a whole. Our hands-on team handles every aspect of your project from start to finish. Our development model combines a highly-skilled, business-focused strategic team that works face-to-face with clients, and technical teams that provide efficiency and scalability for enterprise clients.
We are a leader in the open source community and trusted for the work that we do. Duo focuses on Drupal because of its open source architecture and well-documented API, which means that we can easily integrate your website with other applications to create custom solutions for marketing automation, eCommerce, and more. With the added resources of parent company CIGNEX Datamatics our open source expertise includes Liferay, Hadoop, MuleSoft, and MongoDB.
Our services include:
Strategy
Discovery
Accessibility Audits
Site and Content Audits
Support Agreements
Whiteboarding Sessions
Experience Design
UX/UI Design
Visual Design
Drupal Development
eCommerce
Integration
Marketing Automation
